The 3RPT/INH regimen give direct observation 9INH regimen self-administered . SECONDARY Objectives : - Compare rate drug discontinuation due adverse drug reaction associate 3RPT/INH 9INH . - Compare rate drug discontinuation reason associate 3RPT/INH 9INH . - Compare rate grade 3 , 4 , 5 drug toxicity associate 3RPT/INH 9INH . - Compare treatment completion rate 3RPT/INH 9INH .
